constraints.constraint: No unverifiable claims; no brand lore beyond prompt/context
Prefer outcomes homeowners feel: safety, time saved, comfort, energy savings, simplicity
Do not show internal reasoning; output final results only

instruction.action: Extract and present key features and benefits.

format_each_item.title: Short, evocative label
format_each_item.microproof: Quick proof: metric, standard, or assumption

details.schema:
<analysis> <product_name_analysis> <current_assessment>...</current_assessment> <alternatives> <option reason="...">...</option> <option reason="...">...</option> <option reason="...">...</option> </alternatives> <final_recommendation>...</final_recommendation> <tagline>...</tagline> </product_name_analysis>
<implied_specs> <spec name="Connectivity" source="visual_inference">...</spec> <spec name="Ecosystem/Compatibility" source="context">...</spec> <spec name="Security/Privacy" source="context">...</spec> <spec name="Power/Backup" source="visual_inference">...</spec> <spec name="Dimensions/Finish" source="visual_inference">...</spec> <assumptions> <assumption>...</assumption> </assumptions> </implied_specs>
<features_benefits count="5" style="apple-like"> <item> <title>...</title> <benefit>...</benefit> <feature>...</feature> <microproof>...</microproof> </item> </features_benefits>
<rewritten_original_prompt> ... </rewritten_original_prompt> </analysis>

quality_checklist.check: Assumptions clearly labeled; no unsupported claims
Short lines; plain language; value before tech
